summary: Diff adds a Motoko backend actor with core types for users/trips/plans/listings and a frontend with routing, Internet Identity auth gating, trip planner UI, listings CRUD UI, and sponsored suggestions rendering. Some user-facing additions (caffeine.ai branding/admin token) appear outside the BuildRequest, and some requirements cannot be fully verified due to truncation/omitted files.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes third-party promotional attribution/link to caffeine.ai (“Built with … caffeine.ai”).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for any external promotional footer content or outbound referral links.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend/frontend include an admin/secret-token based access-control initialization flow (caffeineAdminToken and _initializeAccessControlWithSecret).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires Internet Identity auth and per-caller access controls, but does not specify any admin-secret bootstrap token mechanism.
